argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hlatjcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | hlatjcl.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 3 |  | hlatjcl.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_hllat | |- ( K e. HL -> K e. Lat ) |
| 5 | 1, 3 | #P_atbase | |- ( X e. A -> X e. B ) |
| 6 | 1, 3 | #P_atbase | |- ( Y e. A -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 | 1, 2 | #P_latjcl | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) e. B ) |
| 8 | 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_syl3an | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) e. B ) |
